verses.verse: If there arise<WH6965> in the midst<WH7130> of you a prophet,<WH5030> or a dreamer<WH2492> of dreams,<WH2472> and he give<WH5414> you a sign<WH226> or a wonder,<WH4159>

and the sign<WH226> or the wonder<WH4159> come to pass,<WH935> of which he spoke<WH1696> to you,<WH559> saying, "Let us go<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430>" (which you have not known<WH3045>) "and let us serve them;<WH5647>"

you shall not listen<WH8085> to the words<WH1697> of that prophet,<WH5030> or to that dreamer<WH2492> of dreams:<WH2472> for Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> proves you,<WH3426> to know<WH3045> whether you<WH3426> love<WH157> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all your heart<WH3824> and with all your soul.<WH5315>

You shall walk<WH3212> after<WH310> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and fear<WH3372> him,<WH8104> and keep his commandments,<WH4687> and obey<WH8085> his voice,<WH6963> and you shall serve<WH5647> him,<WH1692> and cling to him.

That prophet,<WH5030> or that dreamer<WH2492> of dreams,<WH2472> shall be put to death,<WH4191> because he has spoken<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and redeemed<WH6299> you out of the house<WH1004> of bondage,<WH5650> to draw<WH5080> you aside out of the way<WH1870> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> you to walk in.<WH3212> So you shall put<WH1197> away<WH1197> the evil<WH7451> from the midst of you.<WH7130>

If your brother,<WH251> the son<WH1121> of your mother,<WH517> or your son,<WH1121> or your daughter,<WH1323> or the wife<WH802> of your bosom,<WH2436> or your friend,<WH7453> who is as your own soul,<WH5315> entice<WH5496> you secretly,<WH5643> saying,<WH559> "Let us go<WH3212> and serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430>" which you have not known,<WH3045> you,<WH1> nor your fathers;

of the gods<WH430> of the peoples<WH5971> who are around<WH5439> you,<WH7138> near to you,<WH7350> or far off from you,<WH7097> from the one end of the earth<WH776> even to the other end<WH7097> of the earth;<WH776>
you shall not consent<WH14> to him,<WH8085> nor listen to him;<WH5869> neither shall your eye pity<WH2347> him,<WH2550> neither shall you spare, neither shall you conceal him:<WH3680>
but you shall surely<WH2026> kill<WH2026> him;<WH3027> your hand shall be first<WH7223> on him to put him to death,<WH4191> and afterwards<WH314> the hand<WH3027> of all the people.<WH5971>

You shall stone<WH5619> him to death with stones,<WH5619> because he has sought<WH1245> to draw you away<WH5080> from Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> out<WH3318> of the house<WH1004> of bondage.<WH5650>
All Israel<WH3478> shall hear,<WH8085> and fear,<WH3372> and shall not do<WH6213> any<WH1697> more<WH3254> such wickedness<WH7451> as this is in the midst of you.<WH7130>
If you shall hear<WH8085> tell concerning one<WH259> of your cities,<WH5892> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you to dwell<WH3427> there,<WH559> saying,

Certain<WH1121> base<WH1100> fellows<WH582> are gone out<WH3318> from the midst<WH7130> of you,<WH5080> and have drawn away the inhabitants<WH3427> of their city,<WH5892> saying,<WH559> "Let us go<WH3212> and serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430>" which you have not known;<WH3045>

then you shall inquire,<WH1875> and make search,<WH2713> and ask<WH7592> diligently;<WH3190> and,<WH571> behold, if it be truth, and the thing<WH1697> certain,<WH3559> that such<WH2063> abomination<WH8441> is done<WH6213> in the midst of you,<WH7130>

you shall surely<WH5221> strike<WH5221> the inhabitants<WH3427> of that city<WH5892> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> destroying it utterly,<WH2763> and all that is therein and its livestock,<WH929> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719>

You shall gather<WH6908> all its spoil<WH7998> into the midst<WH8432> of its street,<WH7339> and shall burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784> the city,<WH5892> and all its spoil<WH7998> every whit,<WH3632> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God:<WH430> and it shall be a heap<WH8510> forever;<WH5769> it shall not be built again.<WH1129>

Nothing<WH3972> of the devoted thing<WH2764> shall cling<WH1692> to your hand;<WH3027> that Yahweh<WH3068> may turn<WH7725> from the fierceness<WH2740> of his anger,<WH639> and show<WH5414> you mercy,<WH7356> and have compassion<WH7355> on you,<WH7235> and multiply you,<WH7650> as he has sworn to your fathers;<WH1>

when you shall listen<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to keep<WH8104> all his commandments<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> to do<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> in the eyes<WH5869> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
